pr_title: Add decorations to ir nodes in Painless

timeline.message: add scoping for script, class, and method to WriteScope
update scope to include classwriter and methodwriter
move write to an external phase
convert expression type to ir decoration

timeline.author: stu-elastic
stu-elastic
stu-elastic
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1195,11 +1203,11 @@ public void visitTypeCaptureReference(TypedCaptureReferenceNode irTypedCaptureRe
         Variable captured = writeScope.getVariable(irTypedCaptureReferenceNode.getCaptures().get(0));
 
         methodWriter.visitVarInsn(captured.getAsmType().getOpcode(Opcodes.ILOAD), captured.getSlot());
-        Type methodType = Type.getMethodType(
-                MethodWriter.getType(irTypedCaptureReferenceNode.getExpressionType()),
+        Type methodType = Type.getMethodType(MethodWriter.getType(
+                irTypedCaptureReferenceNode.getDecoration(IRDExpressionType.class).getType()),
